channel.title: Kick wont kick
channel.description:
can someone please tell me how to fix my kick the problem is this : when you right click kick it doesnt kick and when you type the kick command mods cant do it...
im using reapagescape v2

item.title: Kick wont kick
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

ok i fixed it so mods can kick , thanks but the right click kick wont work

Read full topic

item.title: Kick wont kick
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

isnt ragescape v2 a 508. If not this will help you. If it is sorry I cant help with 508s.

That one makes everyone able to kick if you want mod+ to kick add

&& playerRights >= 1

to the part that says

if (command.startsWith("kick"))

so it looks like this

if (command.startsWith("kick") && playerRights >= 1)

Read full topic

item.title: Kick wont kick
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

if (command.startsWith("kick")) { PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5); sendMessage("You kicked " + command.substring(5)); System.out.println( "Admin:" + playerName + " is kicking " + command.substring(5)); ; }

thats my kick, and it works.

i only tryed it while being owner kicking my self and it worked.

Read full topic

item.title: Kick wont kick
item.dc:creator: @Bubbsy7 Bubbsy7
item.description:
@Bubbsy7 wrote:

Because I’m nice heres mine:

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“kick”))
{
PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5);
sendMessage("You kicked “+command.substring(5));
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+” is kicking “+command.substring(5));;
} else if(command.startsWith(“char”)) {
showInterface(3559);
} else if (command.startsWith(“kick”)) {
try {
PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+”: Kicking Player: "+command.substring(5);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/kicklogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" kicked "+PlayerHandler.kickNick);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging kicks!");
 }
  }


  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./logs/kicklogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" kicked "+PlayerHandler.kickNick);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging kicks!");
 }
  }
			} catch(Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::kick [PLAYERNAME]");
			}
		} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kickall")) {
			PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
		}
	} else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) {
                    if(muted == 1)
                    sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
                    else
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5);
	}
}[/code]
